Changing the Archive Location

This procedure assumes that you have created a project database and specified an archive location, and then later needed to change the location before you populated it with archive files (no archive files are stored in the archive location).

To change the archive location:

  1. Select the project database or project.

  2. Select File | Properties. The Properties dialog box appears.

  3. In the New Archive Location field, enter the path of the new location.

  4. Click OK.

See Also

Importing Archives After Moving the Location
